alert.note: Alert for Lucas; Wood (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 2:50PM EDT until July 26 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wood County in northwestern Ohio... Lucas County in northwestern Ohio... * Until 345 PM EDT. * At 250 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles south of Adrian to 6 miles northwest of Delta to near Wauseon to near Defiance, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Toledo, Bowling Green, Fostoria, Swanton, Perrysburg, Oregon, Sylvania, Rossford, Waterville, Northwood, Whitehouse, North Baltimore, Holland, Weston, Maumee, Ottawa Hills, Walbridge, Pemberville, Millbury and Haskins. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
